description: Point geometry feature class representing Community Behavioral Health Centers and Resource locations, developed directly from address information obtained directly from the Office of Emergency Preparedness and Response, Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment, in 2017.  Coordinate locations (latitude/longitude) were derived from the known street addresses of health facilities using a combination of Centrus MapMarker geocoding software and Google Earth imagery locations.  This file was developed for use in activities and exercises within the Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment.
title: CDPHE Community Behavioral Health Centers
